name: Baldi's Definity School
description:
Sorry Windows Players It's A Mac Game And I Will Make An Windows Ver Maybe...

THERES 3 MAPS!

Map 1 Special Things 1: Collect All 10 Notebooks And Take 4 Exits To Win!

Map 2 Special Things 2: Collect Only 3 Notebooks And Find A Elevator To Win!

Map 3: Collect All 9 Notebooks And Touch 4 Exits To Win!

It's A Game With 3 Maps!

Credits:
